auth.signInSubtitle: Welcome back. Please sign in to continue.
auth.signupSubtitle: Sign up with your email and password. A verification email will be sent.
auth.verifyBody: We sent a verification link to your email. Please check it and sign in again.

log.title: Today's log
log.noFailures: You haven't smoked at all today! Amazing!
log.loggedToday: You logged {{count}} {{count, plural, one {cigarette} other {cigarettes}}} today
log.noEntries: No log entries for this date. Tap the + button to record any cigarettes you smoked.

redMean.noFailures: You were perfect today. Keep this streak going.
redMean.noEntries: No entries yet. Today can still be the day you become stronger.
redMean.howMany: How many cigarettes did you smoke?

map.title: Smoke-free zone map
map.noZones: There are no registered zones in this area.
map.locationPermissionBody: We need your location to show smoke-free zones around you.
map.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this zone?

redMean.noActive: You have no active goals. Start now.
redMean.activeNoFailures: You are working on {{count}} goal(s). Today was perfect!
redMean.activeWithFailures: {{active}} goals in progress. You failed {{failures}} time(s) today.

motivation.startJourney: Ready to start your smoke-free journey? Set your first goal!
motivation.activeNoFailures: {{count}} active goals. You were perfect today! üéâ
motivation.completed: You have achieved {{count}} goal(s)! Set a new one and keep going.

alerts.activatedBodyRed: {{count}} goal(s) have been activated. Time to push yourself.
alerts.failedBodyRed: Failed to activate goals. Please try again.
alerts.failedBody: Failed to add goals. Please try again.

empty.noCompletedRed: You haven't completed any missions yet.
empty.noCompleted: No goals have been completed yet.
empty.selectMissionsRed: Select missions and challenge yourself to quit smoking.
empty.chooseGoals: Choose from suggested goals to start your quit journey.
empty.allMissionsTriedRed: You have tried all missions. Check which ones you completed.
empty.allGoalsTried: Nice! You've tried all the goals.
empty.completeToSeeRed: Once you complete missions, you'll see them here.
empty.completeToSee: When you complete goals, they'll show up here!

select.title: üéØ Select goals
select.subtitle: Choose goals that fit your smoke-free journey.
select.subtitleRed: Choose your missions and challenge yourself to quit smoking.

reduce_half.title: Cut in half
reduce_half.redMeanDescription: Cut your smoking in half. No excuses.

daily_limit_3.title: Limit to 3 a day
daily_limit_3.description: Smoke at most 3 cigarettes per day
daily_limit_3.redMeanDescription: 3 cigarettes a day is the hard limit. Control yourself.

daily_limit_1.title: 1 cigarette a day
daily_limit_1.redMeanDescription: Only 1 cigarette a day is allowed. Nothing more.

weekend_warrior.title: Smoke-free weekends
weekend_warrior.description: Do not smoke at all on weekends
weekend_warrior.redMeanDescription: Stay completely smoke free on weekends. It takes real willpower.

workday_clean.title: No smoking during work
workday_clean.description: Do not smoke during working hours
workday_clean.redMeanDescription: Never smoke at work. Zero exceptions.

week_streak.title: 7-day streak
week_streak.redMeanDescription: Stay smoke free for 7 days straight.

month_champion.title: 30-day champion
month_champion.redMeanDescription: Stay smoke free for 30 days. Prove you can do it.

morning_control.title: No smoking in the morning
morning_control.redMeanDescription: Absolutely no smoking in the morning. Show some discipline.

settings.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings
settings.subtitle: Adjust how the app works for you.
settings.enableLocalDescOff: Turn this on to receive helpful reminders.
settings.firstReminderAt: The first reminder will be sent at this time.
settings.nicknameDesc: Set the name that will be shown on your account.
settings.deleteAccountDesc: All of your data will be permanently deleted.
settings.deleteConfirmBody: Your account and all records will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteWarnBody: You're getting close to your goals.
settings.deleteWarnBodyActive: You currently have {{count}} goal(s) in progress.

reminders.title: Reminders
reminders.dailyDesc: Reminders that help you stay smoke free throughout the day.
reminders.dailyDescRed: How many reminders do you want per day?
reminders.weekendDesc: Reminders that help you stay smoke free on weekends and holidays.
reminders.weekendDescRed: Take control of yourself on weekends.

weekendDialog.title: Weekend reminder settings
weekendDialog.message: How can we support you on weekends?

cost.title: Cost tracking
cost.packCostDesc: How much does one pack of cigarettes cost?
cost.packCostPromptBody: Enter the price of one pack of cigarettes.
cost.cigsPerPackDesc: How many cigarettes are in one pack?
cost.cigsPerPackPromptBody: Select how many cigarettes are in one pack.

messages: Remember your goal. Every cigarette you don't smoke is a win. üèÜ

You've come so far already. Don't give up now. üåü

redMeanMessages: Being weak is a choice. Choose to be strong.
Every cigarette you smoke is a loss.
Stop making excuses. Start making progress.
Your addiction doesn't own you. You own it.
Quitting is the choice of a winner. Smoking is the choice of a loser.
Be better than your worst craving.
You are stronger than a single cigarette. Prove it.
Stop poisoning yourself. Start respecting yourself.
Winners don't make excuses. Winners make progress.
